h2_title: Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast Boss Fight and Guide
content: One move to watch out for that has a wider area of attack is when it scraps its fist along the floor and flings an arc of fire toward you. These will stay on the ground for a while, and the beast can create multiple of them at once. This is when you'll want to have the Body-Cooling Powder and Fireproof Mantle on hand, as it becomes harder to dodge these the more they build up.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bishui_Golden-Eyed_Beast.md', within the main section titled 'Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast', specifically from the subsection 'Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
One move to watch out for that has a wider area of attack is when it scraps its fist along the floor and flings an arc of fire toward you. These will stay on the ground for a while, and the beast can create multiple of them at once. This is when you'll want to have the Body-Cooling Powder and Fireproof Mantle on hand, as it becomes harder to dodge these the more they build up.
